item.title: Motivation
item.description: For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide. The main motivation for this blog is to have a reference to my thoughts and opinions throughout time, as I noticed it’s very hard for me to remember all the things that I believed 5-10 years ago. I think it’s a necessity to ask other people’s opinion about your ideas, and one of them should be you, you from X years ago. You are a different person now, after so long, but still share a lot in common with past-you.
